briefTitle: Rotigotine Effect on All-day Functioning and Quality of Life in Subjects With Moderate to Severe Restless Legs Syndrome (RLS)
officialTitle: A Phase 3B, Double-Blind, Randomized, Placebo-Controlled Study of Rotigotine and Its Effect on All-Day Functioning and Quality of Life in Subjects With Moderate to Severe Idiopathic Restless Legs Syndrome
summary: The purpose of the study is to show that Rotigotine improves Restless Legs Syndrome (RLS) symptoms in subjects with moderate to severe RLS during both day and evening.

primaryOutcome.measure: Change From Baseline To The End Of The Maintenance Period in International Restless Legs Scale (IRLS) Sum Score
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: Baseline to End of Maintenance Period (approximately 7 weeks)
